about_the_game:
◆ Game Features

・Overview
Fill three trains with animals, create chains, and aim for a high score. Animals can't board trains with station staff, so sneak past them and rush to the open doors.

・Scoring System
The more you chain animals, the higher your score. You can keep boarding animals until you run out of lives.

・Stamina System
Animals lose stamina when they touch station staff or as time passes. Chaining animals restores stamina, but as time progresses, the rate of stamina depletion increases.

・Ranking System
View global rankings online.


Supported Languages: Japanese, English

Developed by a team of four students. Game streaming is highly encouraged.

For emergencies, bugs, or inquiries, please contact us via the email address on the store page.

※ Even with supported versions, there may be instances where the game doesn't run properly due to device specifications. In such cases, we kindly ask you to proceed with Steam's refund process.

・Overview

・Scoring System
The more you chain animals, the higher your score. You can keep boarding animals until you run out of lives.

・Ranking System

Supported Languages: Japanese, English

Developed by a team of four students. Game streaming is highly encouraged.

For emergencies, bugs, or inquiries, please contact us via the email address on the store page.

※ Even with supported versions, there may be instances where the game doesn't run properly due to device specifications. In such cases, we kindly ask you to proceed with Steam's refund process.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.8+
  • Processor: 1.5GHZ +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet is required for online play.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.8+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.3 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet is required for online play.

name: DOASHIME-ドアを閉めるぞ-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Dive into the chain boarding game "DOASHIME - Close the Door!" and fill the train with cute animals. While avoiding being spotted by station staff, chain same-colored animals for points, and ensure they board. Score until the last second and ascend to the top of the global rankings.
